page.title: 11Playing Squash in Marlow
page.content: The Oasis Squash Club,{Marlow}was built in 1977. They thought of the name Oasis because it stood in the middle of an industrial estate, almost in the middle of nowhere.{Susan Devoy} has played there sometimes. She is the women's number one squash player in the world. The Oasis club has six courts and 31 staff. There is not a fixed age that you have to be to play squash. There was once a young child of four playing and another was a man of seventy! They have had no break-ins or spraying on the walls. They have a sport's shop but they are going to do away with it because it is not doing enough trade. They have held a competition which attracted men from all over the world. They came from Singapore and Australia. It was won by a man called David Lloyd aged 19.
